trait.silentcompat.abyssal_synergy.desc: Tools deal more damage and less durability loss the deeper you are
trait.silentcompat.diurnal.desc: Deal increased damage during the day. Gear slowly repairs during the day
trait.silentcompat.dodging.desc: Grants a chance to avoid damage. Requires full armor set
trait.silentcompat.edible.desc: Chance to drop a chocolate chip on durability loss
trait.silentcompat.emu_dodge.desc: Grants a chance to avoid projectile damage. Requires full armor set
trait.silentcompat.ender_flu.desc: Infects the target with Ender Flu
trait.silentcompat.featherweight.desc: Targets take additional knockback when hit
trait.silentcompat.fleetfooted.desc: Increases speed while jumping and sprinting on-hit
trait.silentcompat.freezing.desc: Attacks build up freezing on target. At max freeze, damage is dealth over time. Just like stepping in powdered snow.
trait.silentcompat.gooey.desc: Attacks have a chance to apply scintling goo under the target's feet
trait.silentcompat.hungering_strike.desc: Deal more damage while under half hunger
trait.silentcompat.knightly.desc: Attacks do extra damage to armored targets
trait.silentcompat.knockout.desc: Chance to inflict a heavy knockback to targets
trait.silentcompat.lucky_break.desc: Chance to gain random potion effect when hit. Effected by luck
trait.silentcompat.neptunes_might.desc: Does more damage to targets while in water
trait.silentcompat.nocturnal.desc: Deal increased damage at night. Gear slowly repairs at night
trait.silentcompat.retaliating_blast.des: Attacks or being attacked have a chance to apply a delayed explosion on the target
trait.silentcompat.soul_steal.desc: Chance to gain life steal on hit
trait.silentcompat.unstable_magic.desc: Somtimes gain a random positive magic effect or apply random negative magic effect to targets
trait.silentcompat.vigorous.desc: Deal more damage while at full health
trait.silentcompat.vorpal.desc: Deal more damage to targets with over 200 hearts
